titles.title: And Must I Part With All I Have (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And must I part with all I have My dearest Lord for Thee It is but right since Thou hast done Much more than this for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yes let it go - one look from Thee Will more than make amends For all the losses I sustain Of credit - riches - friends{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ten thousand worlds Ten thousand lives How worthless they appear Compar'd with Thee Supremely good Divinely bright and fair{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Savior of souls Could I from Thee A single smile obtain Though destitute Of all things else I'd glory in my gain{/lang-eng}
